DesireDef.label: I want something pretty in my room
DesireDef.description: I want something in my room with a beauty score of at least 50.

DesireDef.description: I want something in my room with a beauty score of at least 100.

DesireDef.description: I want something in my room with a beauty score of at least 600.

DesireDef.label: I want something unbelievably beautiful in my room
